content:
Once upon a time in the land of Croatia
A mighty and proud nation didst flourish and grow
With a spirit as strong as the mountains so high
The Croatian people didst never dare to be low

Their hearts didst beat with the passion of fire
And their courage didst know no bounds
They didst face every challenge with desire
And their will didst never be found wanting

Their land didst yield the fruits of the earth
And the sea didst provide for their needs
With industry and labor, they didst bring forth great worth
And their cities didst flourish with good deeds

So let us raise a glass and give a cheer
To the brave and noble land of Croatia
May their flag forever wave free and clear
And may their people always be full of life and laughter.
